short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show DEGIRO's Commission-free ETFs when browsing justetf.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
European investors browse on justetf.com to find the best ETFs. Some of these ETFs can be traded commission-free through DEGIRO.

This extension shows a notification box on the bottom-right corner when you are looking at an ETF page on justetf.com, that lets you know if the ETF is a commission-free ETF for DEGIRO, or not.

An account with justetf.com is NOT required.
